content: 42 43 5 42 43 5 cm this is 4 5 5 5 5 6 11 5 13 14 15 cm less than total length desired divide for neck armhole detail showing place a removeable marker on the first st of the row rolled edging keeping in pattern work the neckline as follows work 28 31 32 34 sts w&t work to eor work 26 28 29 31 sts w&t work to eor work 24 26 27 28 sts w&t work to eor continue as established with w&t on the st before the previous w&t 11x 13 16 17 18 sts continue on the rem 13 16 17 18 sts until length from the removeable marker is 4 5 5 5 5 6 11 5 13 14 15 cm ending on a rs row last row p4 7 8 9 w&t k4 7 8 9 cut yarn leaving a 15 38 cm tail place sts on holder turn work so that ws is facing and join in yarn keeping in pattern work the neckline as follows place a removeable marker on the first st of the row note that you will be beginning each row on the ws and ending on the rs work 28 31 32 34 sts w&t work to eor work 26 28 29 31 sts w&t work to eor work 24 26 27 28 sts w&t work to eor continue as established with w&t on the st before the previous w&t 11x 13 16 17 18 sts continue on the rem 13 16 17 18 sts until length from the removeable marker is 4 5 5 5 5 6 11 5 13 14 15 cm ending on a ws row last row k4 7 8 9 w&t p4 7 8 9 cut yarn leaving a 15 38 cm tail place sts on holder 4 back work band as for front optional final row of band to add a little extra depth to the back work in pattern until 6 sts from the eor w&t work to 7 sts from eor w&t work to eor no need to knit the wraps change to larger needles and work body as for front work armhole as for front until work measures 19 5 20 5 20 5 21 5 50 52 52 55 cm this is 1½ 4 cm less than the total length desired work 16 19 20 21 sts w&t work to eor continue as established with w&t on the st before the previous w&t 3x 13 16 17 18 sts work 1 row with w&t on the last st last row p4 7 8 9 w&t k4 7 8 9 cut yarn place sts on holder turn work so that ws is facing and join in yarn keeping in pattern work the neckline as follows note that you will be beginning each row on the ws and ending on the rs work 16 19 20 21 sts w&t work to eor continue as established with w&t
